reviewText: This was my absolute favorite tape as a kid. I'm 21 now and still go back to this tape...in my move to a different apartment, it got lost so I sadly no longer have it, but I just told my sister I would LOVE this for my birthday !!! Now to either find a Vhs player or how to convert it to dvd

I bought this movie for my kids about 4 years ago. Still have it and now another baby loves it. i think its definitely better for 3 and under age group though. The VHS just last so much better in my opinion. not a very long movie though. but we love it around here!
This video teaches children the capital letters and has a song for each letter of the alphabet. It is very effective at teaching children as young as 2 the alphabet.
